lines: Unoda kuraramira Jesu vohere? Ungafamba naye here panzira?
Ungamupe here yese mitoro yako? Bvumira kuda kwake.
Masmbâ€™ Ake angakupindura, Ropa rake rino sunungura,
Unoda kusunungurwa na Jesu here? Unoda runyararo rwake here?
Unoda kuponiswa usazo putsike? Bvumira kuda kwake.
Unoda zororo muvushe hwake here? Ungedza simba rakevo here?
Ungamushandira nemwoyo wese here? Bvumira kuda kwake.
